channel.title: Blog on Hinode
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Hinode

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Welcome to Math & Beyond Odyssey: Embark on a Journey of Discovery and Mastery

In the vast universe of knowledge, mathematics serves as both a guiding star and a foundational pillar. It is a language that transcends cultures, a tool that unlocks the mysteries of the universe, and an art form that celebrates logic and creativity. Welcome to “Math & Beyond Odyssey,” where we embark on an exhilarating journey through the captivating world of mathematics and its boundless applications.

item.title: simultaneous linear equations reading
item.description:
2x+y=105x+2y=24 \begin{align} 2x + y &= 10 \tag{1} \\ 5x + 2y &= 24 \tag{2} \end{align}

answer key:

x=4 x=4 y=2 y = 2
